content: The common narrative that Tesla lost the EV sales crown to BYD and is experiencing declining sales misses the true context of the situation.

Five prominent AI leaders (Sam Altman, Sundar Pichai, Satya Nadella, Jensen Huang, and Elon Musk) have made similar predictions about an upcoming technological shift, converging on a timeline that most people are unprepared for.
The period between 2025 and 2027 is frequently cited by tech giants as a significant timeline for upcoming AI-driven changes.
The convergence of AI, robotics, and energy will lead to a future where intelligence is "too cheap to meter."
The current shift involving AI and Tesla is the most significant observed in 14 years of covering these topics.
